transcript:
I believe that some astrologer predicted
that you would get married to Twinkle? -Is that true?
-Yeah. -What's the story behind it?
-Why don't you go ahead and say it? -You say.
-It's your interview. -It's not mine, it's yours.
-But it's your astrologer. Yeah, so my father had an astrologer
who once said that I would marry Akshay Kumar. And I didn't know him,
and then I married him. -Really?
-Yeah. -That was true.
-Wow. He was a very good astrologer.
I mean, 18 years ago, he said I'd become a well-known
writer, I hadn't written a thing. So, yeah. You want his number,
I can give it to you. -I don't think I want to--
-He stays in Delhi. I don't want to know the future. I like the uncertainty. -Absolutely. We were also not sure--
-Deep. Very deep.
I must say, very deep. I mean, a lot of uncertainty.
We didn't know this was going to beâ€¦ But wait, what happened? -He predicted the marriage?
-He predicted that, -but we didn't really believe him.
-He told your dad about it. He told my dad. We actually met
because of my dad. My dad had an old
producer friend. And you know, like how
some emperor says, "I have commanded
that this happens!" My father said, you have to work in
this movie because I have given my word. -And she didn't want to work with me.
-And I didn't want to work with him at that point, but I did. She was literally pushed
in that film. Just do this film! -It was not because of you. She just--
-It was because of me. -Because of me. Ask her.
-No! -Ask her.
-Because she was working with amazing people like me. -We didn't--
-So she said, not him. Why didn't you want to work with him? He was going through a bad phase.
I was being snobby. I had given a lot of flops,
so she didn't want to work with me. -You've always given some flops.
-Many flops? And then super hits.
So, who cares?
